questions.name: before
questions.prompt: Have we sold this company or corporate group before?

questions.name: money
questions.prompt: How much money are we talking?

questions.name: needs
questions.prompt: Any unusual needs on their part?

questions.name: expand
questions.prompt: Is there unusually high potential for the dollar value of the deal to grow over time?

questions.name: master
questions.prompt: Are we aware of other business groups or corporate affiliates we can sell to?

questions.name: strategy
questions.prompt: Is this lead strategically valuable in some other way?

questions.name: questionnaires
questions.prompt: Have we received or responded to any questionnaires? Please send me copies, and let me know who handled them.

questions.name: deadline
questions.prompt: Is their budget or procurement process tied to a deadline, like the end of a quarter?

questions.name: rfp
questions.prompt: Are we participating in an RFP, beauty contest, or bake-off?

questions.name: incumbent
questions.prompt: Are they currently with a competitor?
